thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bulgaria's stock exchange acquires energy bourse IBEX

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bulgaria's stock exchange acquires energy bourse IBEX
text:
SOFIA, Feb 5 (Reuters) - The Bulgarian Stock Exchange BSE , majority controlled by the state, has finalised a 5.2 million levs ($3.3 million) deal to acquire the Balkan countryâ€™s energy exchange IBEX after receiving all regulatory approvals, it said on Monday.
State-owned energy holding BEH pledged to transfer the control of the day-ahead power exchange, setup in early 2016, as part of a settlement with the EU over antitrust charges that it blocked rivals in the Bulgarian wholesale power market. ($1 = 1.5756 leva) (Reporting by Tsvetelia Tsolova, editing by David Evans)
